location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Photograph of the Northern Watershed of Al Qutun

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 1 black and white photographDimensions: 86 x 138mm, on sheet 331 x 202mm

mods.abstract: Photograph of the northern watershed of Al Qutun [Qa≈£an], Dhofar, in the Sultanate of Muscat and Oman. The photograph shows vegetation consisting of short grass and wild olive trees.This photograph is part of a series of photographs that appear at the end of a preliminary report on the land resources of Dhofar, produced by Brian Joseph Hartley, Director of Agriculture, Aden, and dated 20 March 1948.
